entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 06:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
